fixes.name: Profit Margin %
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau calculated field [Profit Margin %] defined as [Profit Ratio ]*100 to a DAX calculated column. Replaced the column reference with 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit Ratio ] and applied multiplication by 100.

fixes.name: Profit vs Target (Uses Profit Margin %)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau expression [Profit Margin %]-15 to a DAX calculated column. Referenced the calculated field as 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit Margin %] and subtracted 15.
